text.div:
Authorize Normal access for Treatment

Patient "P. van de Heuvel" wishes to have all of the PHI collected at the Good Health Psychiatric Hospital available for normal treatment use.

sourceAttachment.title: The terms of the consent in lawyer speak.

--data-raw '{"resourceType":"Consent","id":"95c1c170-803e-478a-939d-f55cd0e25258","status":"active","scope":{"coding":[{"system":"http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/consentscope","code":"patient-privacy"}]},"category":[{"coding":[{"system":"http://loinc.org","code":"59284-0"}]}],"patient":{"reference":"Patient/f001","display":"P. van de Heuvel"},"dateTime":"2016-05-11T08:00:00+08:00","organization":[{"reference":"Organization/f001"}],"sourceAttachment":{"title":"The terms of the consent in lawyer speak."},"policyRule":{"coding":[{"system":"http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActCode","code":"OPTIN"}]},"provision":{"period":{"start":"1964-01-01T08:00:00+08:00","end":"2016-01-01T08:00:00+08:00"}},"meta":{"tag":[{"system":"http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActReason","code":"HTEST","display":"test health data"}],"versionId":"1","lastUpdated":"2022-02-13T22:30:15.347+08:00"}}'
